text.section:
This section applies to:
the making of the appropriate general plan;
any part, amendment, extension, or addition to the plan;
the protection of and the carrying out of the plan; and
the exercise of any:
planning, zoning, or subdivision control powers in the regional district; and
other powers granted in this title to the Commission or to the Montgomery County Council or the Prince George's County Council.

The purpose of the plan is to:
guide and accomplish a coordinated, comprehensive, adjusted, and systematic development of the regional district;
coordinate and adjust the development of the regional district with public and private development of other parts of the State and of the District of Columbia; and
protect and promote the public health, safety, and welfare.
